Class Animal

java.lang.Object
datatypes.Organism
datatypes.Animal
All Implemented Interfaces:
datatypes.Consumable, itumulator.executable.DynamicDisplayInformationProvider, itumulator.simulator.Actor
public abstract class Animal extends datatypes.Organism
The Animal class represents a generic organism with characteristics such as age, energy, metabolism, energy decay, and a search radius. It provides methods for consuming other organisms, wandering, and pursuing targets in a given world.

  • Constructor Details

    • Animal

      public Animal(datatypes.Species species, double metabolism, double energyDecay, int searchRadius, double maxEnergy)
      Constructs a new Animal with the specified species, metabolism, energy decay, and search radius.
      Parameters:
      species - the species of the animal
      metabolism - the rate at which the animal metabolizes energy
      energyDecay - the rate at which the animal's energy decreases over time
      searchRadius - the radius in which the animal searches for food or other entities

  • Method Details

    • dayTimeBehaviour

      protected abstract void dayTimeBehaviour(itumulator.world.World world)

    • nightTimeBehaviour

      protected abstract void nightTimeBehaviour(itumulator.world.World world)

    • act

      public void act(itumulator.world.World world)
      Executes the actions of an animal within the given world, including aging, and performing appropriate behavior based on the time of day.
      Parameters:
      world - The world in which the rabbit behaves.

    • getNutritionalValue

      public double getNutritionalValue()
      Calculates the nutritional value of the animal based on its current energy level and its age, where the contribution of age is capped at 6.
      Returns:
      the nutritional value as a double, computed by multiplying the animal's energy by the ratio of its age (capped at 6) to 6.

    • consume

      public void consume(datatypes.Organism other, itumulator.world.World world)
      Consumes another organism, increasing this organism's energy by the nutritional value of the other organism and triggering the consumption effects on the other organism.
      Parameters:
      other - the organism to be consumed
      world - the world in which the consumption takes place, used to handle effects of the consumption

    • onConsume

      public void onConsume(itumulator.world.World world)
      Handles the event when the animal is consumed by another organism. This method will delete the current instance of the animal from the world.
      Parameters:
      world - the world in which the animal exists

    • wander

      protected void wander(itumulator.world.World world)
      Causes the animal to wander to a random empty neighboring tile in the given world. The method selects an empty neighboring tile at random and moves the animal to that location if such a tile exists.
      Parameters:
      world - the world in which the animal is wandering

    • pursue

      protected void pursue(itumulator.world.World world, itumulator.world.Location location)
      Causes the animal to pursue a specified location within the given world. The animal will move one tile closer to the target location if the tile is empty.
      Parameters:
      world - the world in which the animal is pursuing its target
      location - the target location the animal is trying to move towards
